TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CachedResourceDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

Docs.summary: Provides a cached dictionary that associates resource dictionaries with their URIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension> class that provides XAML markup extensions. Markup extensions return objects based on string attribute values or markup elements in XAML. The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.CachedResourceDictionaryExtension.ProvideValue%2A> method of each extension can use an <xref:System.IServiceProvider> object at run time that can provide context.

Docs.param: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that is set as the value of the target property for this markup extension.
Docs.returns: The value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.CachedResourceDictionaryExtension.ProvideValue%2A> method of each extension can use an <xref:System.IServiceProvider> object at run time that can provide context.
